name: Dice Roller (Jenson_A_Dev)
description:
A simple game about rolling dices to gain currency, more dices, your local group of Tabletop RPGs and even Yahtzee addicted grandmas. You may be even lucky enough to RNGesus to bless you and multiply your rolls.

---------Credits-----------

Jenson A. dos Santos - Coding and 3D Modelling;

Israel G. Bernardo - 2D Art, Textures and Art Direction.

Songs Used:

Folk Round Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
